topic.title: Airport simulation results
topic.text:
As per requested by the professor, here's my airport simulation results:

Simulation parameters with default values
-----------------------------------------
Landing time          : 5
Takeoff time          : 15
Landing probability   : 0.1
Takeoff probability   : 0.08
Fuel limit time       : 20
Total simulation time : 1440

Simulation runs
-- ------ -------- ------- ----------- ----------- ---------------- ----------------
 # Landed Departed Crashes Avg Landing Avg Takeoff In Landing Queue In Takeoff Queue
-- ------ -------- ------- ----------- ----------- ---------------- ----------------
 1    134       51       1       8.060     340.275                0               68

 2    149       46       0       7.960     472.000                0               71

 3    138       50       4       8.319     380.140                1               51

 4    135       51       3       7.400     459.314                0               67

 5    156       44       3       8.782     461.409                0               70



Simulation parameters with total time = 10k seconds
---------------------------------------------------
Landing time          : 5
Takeoff time          : 15
Landing probability   : 0.100
Takeoff probability   : 0.080
Fuel limit time       : 20
Total simulation time : 10000

Simulation runs
-- ------ -------- ------- ----------- ----------- ---------------- ----------------
 # Landed Departed Crashes Avg Landing Avg Takeoff In Landing Queue In Takeoff Queue
-- ------ -------- ------- ----------- ----------- ---------------- ----------------
 1    999      333      21       8.574    3012.781                0              425

 2   1003      332      24       8.460    3130.289                1              475

 3    950      350      12       8.496    2966.046                0              426

 4    960      346      13       8.531    2951.691                0              481

 5   1020      326      19       8.486    2881.187                3              461



Simulation parameters with total time = 100k seconds
----------------------------------------------------
Landing time          : 5
Takeoff time          : 15
Landing probability   : 0.100
Takeoff probability   : 0.080
Fuel limit time       : 20
Total simulation time : 100000

Simulation runs
-- ------ -------- ------- ----------- ----------- ---------------- ----------------
 # Landed Departed Crashes Avg Landing Avg Takeoff In Landing Queue In Takeoff Queue
-- ------ -------- ------- ----------- ----------- ---------------- ----------------
 1   9701     3433     134       8.610   28390.226                2             4441

 2   9859     3380     144       8.559   28472.817                1             4689

 3   9727     3424     174       8.598   29378.734                1             4678

 4   9832     3389     133       8.499   29009.049                0             4769

 5   9662     3446     171       8.486   28263.192                1             4591
